text: The 1964 Soviet Class A Second Group was the second season of the Soviet Class A Second Group football competitions that was established in 1963. It was also the 24th season of the Soviet second tier league competition. ==First stage== ===First subgroup=== ===Second subgroup=== ==Final stage== ===For places 1-14=== ===For places 15-27=== ==See also== * Soviet First League ==External links== * 1964 season. RSSSF 1964 2 Soviet Soviet
title: 1964 Soviet Class A Second Group
